name: Dice Lord (DinoBucket, Lucas Laport, Ricardo Pinas, PaulaAraujo, Joaovdev)
name_original: Dice Lord (DinoBucket, Lucas Laport, Ricardo Pinas, PaulaAraujo, Joaovdev)
description:
Synopsis

Lucas is an Dealer that work in Hard Baby Casino. One day a beautiful woman sits across from him at the table. But he didn't know that this same woman was a witch. As the night passes, the witch gets angry about losing all her money, and at that moment she casts a curse on Luke. That turns you into a jack. Inanimate objects come to life and Lucas only has a single weapon to defend himself with, the dice that was in his hand at the time he was cursed.

Throw your wepon

Lucas can throw his weapon at his enemies. But be careful, because you can only use the dice after charging the number of damage you will apply.

Controls

W - Move up

A - Move left

S - Move down

D - Move right

RMB - Shoot

ESPACE - Use dash

ESC- Pause game
